name: SOUL SHOT (Chaoclypse)
description:
A 3 hour game for Trijam 165

Gameplay & Art  -  Chaoclypse

Music & Sound    -  Vav

Alt+Enter to toggle Fullscreen!
---

The notorious wizard cultists "THE CHAOS VAVS" are out for blood - your blood!

WASD to move and SPACE to shoot - You can only move yourself or the bullet!

Your score is the maximum number of cultists you kill in ONE shot!!!
